name: Marker Seven
description:
Founded in 2000 and headquartered in San Francisco with offices in Richmond VA and Vancouver BC, Marker Seven is an award-winning digital agency with over a decade of experience.  Marker Seven specializes in working with pioneering businesses and organizations that need to tell a clear brand story communicated through a powerful online presence with a strong technical foundation.  Our elite cross-disciplinary team accomplishes this by approaching every facet of brand strategy and execution in
cluding business and brand strategy, online marketing, user experience, visual design, technical architecture, business applications, web and mobile development, and project management.
Over the past decade, Marker Seven has designed, built and maintained websites and custom applications for a wide range of clients and industries.  Our specialized team of strategists, architects, designers and developers will work with our clients to understand and plan the best approach to meet their short and long-term objectives.  We have the proven ability to quickly understand business needs, document requirements, conceptualize, design, develop, test and deploy solutions.  Furthermore, we can augment our client’s internal team by providing ongoing strategic and tactical support after a project is completed.  
Marker Seven is a well-capitalized, management-funded corporation. We focus on long-term viability by growing organically. 100% of our revenue is derived from online marketing and enterprise services.  Because we are a services-based agency, we do not require our clients to buy proprietary software nor do we require clients to use a specific hosting service.
